ModMetaData.name: Add Transport Pod
ModMetaData.author: Saucy_Pigeon
ModMetaData.description:
Can now quickly build transport pods from the pod launcher, without having to go to a separate menu.
For version 1.0: save game compatible - add or remove with no problems. For versions 1.1 and above: will only work with saves without any pod launchers already built.
Load this mod after Advanced Transport Pods if you are using that mod.
